g.text: iniciates the request to add/update a field in a service draft
asks if the user pretends to use an existing draft
[if the user pretends to use an existing draft]
[if the user pretends to use create a new draft]
[until the user doesn't want to add more fields]
asks which field does the user pretend to add/update
requests the user to insert the field
saves the field in the draft and
asks if there is more fields to add
information in the draft and asks for confirmation
registers the draft in the persistence
and informs of the success of the operation
